snippet.title: Naxia - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Description

Naxia is an isometric, hack-and-slash ARPG game with a deep and diverse combat system, uniquely integrated with functionalities of an action-adventure game. It offers various combat system mechanics, such as unique combo chains made up of melee or range movement sets and spells. 

KEY FEATURES

    A Deep and Diverse Combat System
    Dynamic and Fast-paced Action
    Four Different Playable Classes with Different and Unique Gameplay
    A Different and Profound Story for each Class
    Different types of enemies (+20 types)
    Extensive Character Development
    Procedural Content
    Different types of Bosses
    A Crafting System
    A Unique Skill Tree and Rage Form for each Class
    Rogue-Like Dungeons and Battle Arenas
    The Ability to Collect Hundreds of Items
    An Xbox and PS Controller Setup
    Secrets to Uncover
    The Ability To Reclaim Skill Points 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1049220/Naxia/
Website : http://naxiathegame.com/
infinite8 : http://infinite8.ae/
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
for more information:

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/naxiagame
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/naxiagame
Follow us on Sketchfab: https://sketchfab.com/naxia
